description: Productboard is a product management platform that gathers feedback, prioritizes features, and aligns roadmaps based on customer insights and strategic goals

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_ADD_NOTE_FOLLOWERS
capabilities.description: Tool to add multiple followers to a Productboard note. Use when you need to bulk-add existing users as followers to a specific note by their email addresses.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_ADD_NOTE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to add a tag to a Productboard note. Use when categorizing a note after review; creates the tag if missing.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPANY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new company in Productboard. Use when you need to add a company record after gathering its details and optional metadata.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPANY_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new custom field for companies. Use when you need to define custom company attributes in Productboard after confirming the field schema.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPONENT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new (sub)component under a product or component. Use after determining the parent component ID.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new note in Productboard. Use when you need to programmatically add a user or customer note to Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_NOTE_LINK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a link between a note and an entity. Use when associating a note with a productboard entity.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new webhook subscription. Use when you need to register a public endpoint to receive webhooks from Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_COMPANY
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific company. Use when you have confirmed the company ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_COMPANY_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific company custom field. Use after confirming the field ID and ensuring no dependencies remain.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_FEATURE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific feature. Use when you have confirmed the feature ID and deleted its subfeatures before removal.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific note. Use when you have confirmed the note ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_NOTE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to remove a tag from a Productboard note. Use when you need to detach a specific tag from a note after tagging.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific user. Use when you have confirmed the user ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPANIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list companies. Use when you need a paginated list of companies with optional filters.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPANY_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Tool to list company custom fields. Use when you need to retrieve all custom field definitions for companies after authentication.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPONENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list productboard components. Use when you need to retrieve components in a paginated form. Follow 'links.next' for additional pages.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Tool to list custom field definitions for hierarchy entities. Use after determining which field types to filter.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUES
capabilities.description: Tool to list non-empty custom field values. Use when you need to fetch set values across custom fields with optional filtering by type or field ID. Paginate using links.next if more results exist.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_INITIATIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to list initiatives linked to a given feature. Use when you need to retrieve all initiatives associated with a feature after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_OBJECTIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to list objectives linked to a feature. Use when you need to retrieve all objectives connected to a given feature after confirming the feature ID.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_RELEASE_ASSIGNMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list featureâ€“release assignments. Use when you need to retrieve assignments for a specific feature or release with optional state or date filters; paginate using links.next.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURES
capabilities.description: Tool to list features and subfeatures. Use when you need a paginated list of all features in Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_STATUSES
capabilities.description: Tool to list feature statuses. Use when you need to retrieve all feature status records in a paginated form. Follow 'links.next' for additional pages.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEEDBACK_FORM_CONFIGURATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list feedback form configurations. Use when you need a paginated list of feedback form configurations.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_INITIATIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to list initiatives. Use when you need a paginated list of initiatives with optional filters.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_JIRA_INTEGRATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list Jira integrations. Use when you need to retrieve Productboard's connected Jira integrations with optional pagination.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_KEY_RESULTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list key results. Use when you need a paginated list of key results.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_NOTES
capabilities.description: Tool to list notes in Productboard. Use when you need to retrieve notes with optional filters and pagination. Follow links.next for additional pages.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_OBJECTIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to list objectives from Productboard. Use when you need a paginated list of objectives with optional filters; follow 'links.next' to retrieve additional pages.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_PLUGIN_INTEGRATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list plugin integrations. Use when you need a paginated list of plugin integrations.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_PRODUCTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all products in a workspace. Use when you need to retrieve paginated product details.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_RELEASE_GROUPS
capabilities.description: Tool to list release groups. Use when you need a paginated list of release groups. Returns first page of results and link to next page.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_RELEASES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all releases in Productboard. Use when you need a paginated list of releases; follow links.next for more pages.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_USERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list users. Use when you need a paginated list of all users in Productboard.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_REMOVE_NOTE_FOLLOWER
capabilities.description: Tool to remove a follower from a Productboard note. Use after confirming the note ID and follower email are correct.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific company. Use when you have the company ID to fetch its full details.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific company custom field. Use when you have the custom field ID and need its metadata.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY_FIELD_VALUE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a specific company custom field value. Use when you need the current value of a custom field for a given company by its IDs.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_FEATURE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific feature. Use when you need complete info on one feature.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific note. Use when you have the note ID to fetch its full details.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific product. Use when you have the product ID to fetch its full details.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific user. Use when you have the user ID to fetch its full details.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SCIM_LIST_USERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list users via SCIM. Use when checking for existing users before creation.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SET_COMPANY_FIELD_VALUE
capabilities.description: Tool to set or replace a specific company custom field's value. Use when you need to update a company's custom field after confirming the field ID and ensuring the new value matches the field type.

capabilities.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SET_CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE
capabilities.description: Tool to set a custom field value on a hierarchy entity. Use when you need to update a product, component, or feature field with a specific value after confirming the field and entity IDs.
